puzzle.help: 1. Divide the board into Tetrominoes, area of exactly four tiles, of a shape like the pieces of Tetris, that is: L, I, T, S or O. 2. Wood cells are fixed pegs and aren't part of Tetrominoes. 3. Tetrominoes may be rotated or mirrored. 4. Two Tetrominoes sharing an edge must be different.
